title: The MTech thesis work of Mr. Abhinandhan got published in Journal of Alloys and Compounds, Elsevier.
description: His research work centred around developing novel refractory high-entropy alloys by blending small amount of silicon (Si). Specific amount of silicon (x=0.25) improved the strength of the alloy without compromising the ductility, and resistance against corrosion. The findings shall be helpful for the application of this Si blended HEA in aerospace and power-plant applications.

title: MD SAAD PATEL, a PhD scholar of our AMDCG Group from Vellore Institute of Technology, has published a part of his thesis work in Transactions of The Indian Institute of Metals.
description: The article titled 'Microstructural Engineering of As-Cast Mg-Gd-Y Alloys Through Friction Stir Processing Towards Improved Mechanical Performance' highlights the way microstructural refinement transforms the mechanisms of deformation in Magnesium alloyed with rare-earth elements.

title: MD SAAD PATEL, a PhD scholar of our AMDCG Group has published a part of his thesis work in Scientific Reports, one of the most reputed journals in Nature Portfolio.
description: The article describe our fundamental study on the influence of rare earth element alloying on the microstructure formation in Magnesium.
